name: Gregory Denali 100 Backpack - Unisex
description: This alpine expedition pack lets you move impressive payloads in comfort across technical terrain and strips down for summit day. Based on Gregory’s category-defining original, this Denali has a new FusionFlex Pro suspension with dual stays and a canting harness that automatically adjusts to your specific shoulder angles. The removable belt has is precurved and lushly padded to keep your hips unbruised under the most demanding loads. There’s even a sled pull attachment for sieges that are super equipment-intensive.Removable components include hipbelt, frame stays, foam framesheet (doubles as a bivy pad), 2 Velcro ice axe keeper loops and lid. Stripped weights are: Small 1.843kg, Medium 1.928kg, and Large 2.13kg.Main body fabric is double-diamond ripstop nylon.Interior is oxford nylon in a contrast colour for better visibility of contents.Bottom panel is made from heavy oxford nylon for resistance to abrasion and punctures.Sewn-in frame sheet is light, reduces failure points and protects your back from sharp gear.Lightweight anti-barrelling crossstay provides stability.2 large foldaway side pockets for water bottles or pickets.Zippered side pocket for quick access to maps, food bars or a headlamp.Zippered front panel pocket has a zip out internal divider.Hipbelt has sled pull attachment, gear loops, ice clippers and 2 zippered pockets.Gear loops and reinforced daisy chain on front of pack.Crampon patch is dual-layer, internally laminated TPU to prevent point stabs.2 adjustable ice axe loops hold leashless and mixed climbing tools.Rope strap under lid.Alternative webbing for use as a waist belt included, along with spare buckles.Hydration reservoir sleeve and port.V-shaped compression straps don't interfere with side pockets.Crossover front compression straps cinch large loads and provide an alternate lashing point.
